notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Affects every allied unit, including illusions, invulnerable units and hidden units, excluding wards and buildings.
Does not share cooldown with Arcane Boots.
abilities.description: Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies.

name: Arcane Ring
description: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.
trivia: Arcane Boots was originally created as Arcane Ring, being built out of Ring of Protection, Energy Booster, and a recipe. Its recipe got changed and its theme reworked into Arcane Boots in the 6.68 gameplay patch. Arcane Ring's appearance is designed after this as well, sharing aesthetics with Arcane Boots.
Arcane Ring's appearance is designed after this as well, sharing aesthetics with Arcane Boots.
Using Replenish Mana every time it is off cooldown is equivalent to ~1.65 mana per second. Plus 0.5 mana regen from int gives 2.15 mana regen.
